items.title: Trump says he would sign bill to release Epstein files if it reaches his desk
items.description: Trump said he would sign the bill to compel the Justice Department to release all files relating sex offender Jeffrey Epstein if it comes to his desk.

items.title: Judge in Comey case raises alarm over 'profound investigative missteps'
items.description: A judge expressed concern Monday that the government's prosecution of James Comey may have been tainted by "profound investigative missteps."

items.title: WATCH:  Chihuahua's viral moment hearing Spanish helps him find a home
items.description: ABC News' Danny New shares the heartwarming story of how a viral social media clip helped Nacho the chihuahua find his forever home.
